versions.subtitle: Survival Test
versions.funFact: Did you know? Creepers were originally broken Pigs.

versions.subtitle: Late Classic Creative
versions.funFact: Did you know? This update overlapped with "Survival Test".

versions.subtitle: Indev 0.31
versions.funFact: Did you know? Notch released 24 updates under this name.

versions.subtitle: Minecraft Infdev
versions.funFact: Did you know? "Infdev" stands for "Infinite Development".

versions.subtitle: Beta 1.4
versions.funFact: Did you know? The mod "Better than Wolves" was created because its creator disliked this update.

versions.subtitle: Beta 1.7
versions.funFact: Did you know? Pistons were originally a mod.

versions.title: Adventure Update 1
versions.subtitle: Beta 1.8
versions.funFact: Did you know? The hunger system was somewhat controversial.

versions.title: Adventure Update 2
versions.funFact: Did you know? The game was fully released during Minecon 2011.

versions.title: Horse Update
versions.funFact: Did you know? Horses were originally from the mod "Mo' Creatures."

versions.title: The Update that Changed the World

mainFeatures.text: 11 new Biomes such as Mesas and Mega Taigas

versions.title: The Combat Update
versions.description: End Cities, Elytra Wings & Combat Changes
versions.funFact: Did you know? This update is considered the most controversial one so far, due to the combat changes.

minorFeatures.text: Ability to use your second hand

versions.title: World of Color Update
versions.funFact: Did you know? Originally parrots were tamed using cookies, until Mojang discovered that in real life they are poisonous to them. Now, cookies instantly kill parrots. Tame them with seeds instead.

versions.title: Update Aquatic
versions.funFact: Did you know? The name of this update is a reference to the movie "The Life Aquatic".

versions.title: Village & Pillage
versions.description: Village Overhaul, New Textures & Bamboo Forests

mainFeatures.text: Updated all textures of the game

versions.title: Buzzy Bees
versions.funFact: Did you know? This was the first major update with bug fixes and performance improvements as one of its main points. 1.13 was originally supposed to be this, before they added the aquatic features.

minorFeatures.text: A lot of rendering code rewritten

versions.title: Nether Update
versions.funFact: Did you know? Netherite is the first new tool tier since diamonds (added over 10 years ago).

minorFeatures.text: Zombie Pigmen are now Zombified Piglins

versions.title: Caves & Cliffs pt. 1
versions.funFact: Did you know? Goats will target and ram all other mobs, including armor stands!

versions.title: Caves & Cliffs pt. 2
versions.funFact:
Did you know? This was the first major world generation update since 1.7 (over 7 years ago)!
Caves & Cliffs was split into two updates mainly due to the 2020 COVID-19 Pandemic.

mainFeatures.text: Added huge and complex cave systems
Much more varied and extreme terrain generation
Increased Overworld height limit 64 blocks downwards

minorFeatures.text: New overworld music by Lena Raine
New "Otherside" music disc by Lena Raine
Mobs spawn only in complete darkness (light level 0)

versions.title: The Wild Update
versions.funFact: Did you know? The Deep Dark was meant to come during Caves & Cliffs, but Mojang couldn't finish it in time.

versions.title: Trails & Tales
versions.funFact:
Did you know? This update didn't get its name and theme revealed until well into the snapshots.
Fun fact: This update brings the first change to desert wells since they were added, over 11 years ago!

mainFeatures.text: Tweaked behavior of various blocks (e.g. Barrier, Chorus Flower, Sculk Sensor)
Fixed various bugs including major stability issues
Added and improved functionality for blocking and hiding players
Improved error messages before connecting to servers and multiplayer
Added BLM and anti-racism text to the splash screen!
Fixed various crashes and visual glitches
Improved piglin, piglin brutes, hoglins, and zoglins pathfinding
Baby piglins no longer dupe items
Added a disclaimer that informs that online play is not age rated
Renamed game from "Minecraft" to "Minecraft: Java Edition"

versions.funFact: Did you know? Rocket Elytras were suggested by a player. Despite being included in a minor update, this was a game changer.

versions.title: How to Build a Fireplace in Minecraft
Game bought by Microsoft
longDescription: On November of 2014, all of Mojang was acquired by Microsoft for $2.5 billion. This included Minecraft, of course.
The process began a few months earlier. Many suspected this acquisition was happening, but Mojang only confirmed it on September.
According to Notch, he sold Mojang because he didn't want the responsibility of owning a company of such global significance.
As soon as Mojang was sold, Notch and the other two founders (Carl and Jakob) left the company.

versions.subtitle: Pocket Edition Pre-Release
versions.funFact: Not much is known about this version, as it was never publicly released.

versions.subtitle: PE Alpha 0.1
versions.funFact: Did you know? This update added many blocks, being close to Java Edition Infdev.

mainFeatures.text: Iron, Gold, Diamonds and their tools

versions.subtitle: PE Alpha 0.9
versions.funFact: Did you know? This huge update made the game almost equivalent to Java Edition 1.8.

mainFeatures.text: Fences and Gates for each wood type

versions.subtitle: PE Alpha 0.12
versions.funFact: Did you know? This was the first version of the Windows 10 Edition.

versions.title: Ender Update
versions.subtitle: PE 1.0
versions.funFact: This update is equivalent to Java Edition 1.9, without combat changes.

versions.title: Discovery Update
versions.subtitle: PE 1.1
versions.funFact: This update is equivalent to Java Edition 1.11.

versions.title: Better Together Update
versions.description: Merged Pocket Edition with Console Edition
versions.funFact: Did you know? The PS4 did not receive this update because Sony didn't allow the game to have cross-play.

mainFeatures.text: Merged Pocket Edition with Console Edition

versions.funFact: Did you know? This is the major update with the least amount of content in Minecraft history.

minorFeatures.text: Ability to eat food in Creative Mode and in Peaceful Difficulty

mainFeatures.text: Walls, Slabs and Stairs of most rock types
Added many Village & Pillage features as experimental

minorFeatures.text: Bark Blocks and Stripped Bark Blocks
Added many Village & Pillage features as experimental

mainFeatures.text: Updated all textures of the game

minorFeatures.text: The arrival of Bedrock Edition to the PS4

versions.funFact:
Did you know? For the first time, a Java Edition world seed generates the same world in Bedrock!
Caves & Cliffs was split into two updates mainly due to the 2020 COVID-19 Pandemic.

Much more varied and extreme terrain generation
Increased Overworld height limit 64 blocks downwards

minorFeatures.text: New overworld music by Lena Raine
New "Otherside" music disc by Lena Raine
Mobs spawn only in complete darkness (light level 0)

versions.funFact: Did you know? The Deep Dark was meant to come during Caves & Cliffs, but Mojang couldn't finish it in time.
Did you know? This update marks the end of support for the Fire TV.
Did you know? This update marks the end of support for the Fire Phone.

mainFeatures.text: Removed support for third-party shader packs

upcomings.title: Trails & Tales
